post.summary: Create a hydro station. Required operator or admin roles.

200.description: The station id that can be used to access the station.

parameters.name: stationId
parameters.description: A 8 digits station id

parameters.name: operatorStationId
parameters.description: Operator station id

parameters.name: stationOwnerCvr
parameters.description: Station owner cvr with DK12345678 format

parameters.name: operatorCvr
parameters.description: Operator cvr with DK12345678 format

parameters.name: parameterSc
parameters.description: Parameter stancode

parameters.name: examinationTypeSc
parameters.description: Examination type stancode

parameters.name: withResultsAfter
parameters.description: Filter the results after a point in time

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Expect the result format. Only possible value, if specified, are csv and parquet

post.summary: Update a station. A station is identifier by either StationId or OperatorStationId
Update a measurement point. StationId and MeasurementPointNumber are keys to identify the resource.
Add measurements to a measurement point.

Update measurement results. A measurement is identified by measurement date. If it does not exist, skip the update. If the result has not changed, skip the updateIt returns the updated timestamp of all results.
Delete measurements within a date range.
Delete measurements within a specific list of measurement dates.
Delete a result version of a measurement.

get.summary: Returns water level measurements current result.

parameters.name: stationId
parameters.description: Station id. Station id or Operator station id must be specified.

parameters.name: operatorStationId
parameters.description: Operator station id. Station id or Operator station id must be specified.

parameters.name: measurementPointNumber
parameters.description: Measurement point number. If not specified, return data for all measurement points.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: From a measurement date time. Both From and To must be specified if one of them presents. If not specified, return data for the last 24 hours.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: To a measurement date time. Both From and To must be specified if one of them presents. If not specified, return data for the last 24 hours.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Expect the result format. Only possible value, if specified, are csv and parquet

get.summary: Returns water flow measurements current result.

parameters.name: stationId
parameters.description: Station id. Station id or Operator station id must be specified.

parameters.name: operatorStationId
parameters.description: Operator station id. Station id or Operator station id must be specified.

parameters.name: measurementPointNumber
parameters.description: Measurement point number. If not specified, return data for all measurement points.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: From a measurement date time.Both From and To must be specified if one of them presents. If not specified, return data for the last 24 hours.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: To a measurement date time. Both From and To must be specified if one of them presents. If not specified, return data for the last 24 hours.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Expect the result format. Only possible value, if specified, are csv and parquet

get.summary: Returns measurements with result that is valid closest before to the asOff parameter.

parameters.description: Station id. Station id or Operator station id must be specified.

parameters.name: operatorStationId
parameters.description: Operator station id. Station id or Operator station id must be specified.

parameters.name: asOff
parameters.description: The closest date time before when a result was measured. AsOff must be specified

get.summary: Returns stations with associated logger if there is.

parameters.name: stationId
parameters.description: Station id. Station id or Operator station id must be specified.

parameters.name: operatorStationId
parameters.description: Operator station id. Station id or Operator station id must be specified.

parameters.name: loggerId
parameters.description: Logger id

parameters.name: stationOwnerCvr
parameters.description: Station owner CVR with DK format

parameters.name: operatorCvr
parameters.description: Operator CVR with DK format

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Expect the result format. Only possible value, if specified, is csv

get.summary: Return the examination types with mapping and constraints

post.summary: Update the examination type with mapping and constraints by examination type Sc and measurement point type Sc. Create new one if it does not exist

measurementPointNumber.description: Measurement point number in the station

examinationTypeSc.description: Examination type stancode, a subset of stancode 1101

parameterSc.description: Parameter stancode, a subset of stancode list 1008

unitSc.description: Unit stancode, a subset of stancode list 1009

transactionBased.description: True: The batch is treated as a transaction. If one or more fails, no data is persisted in the database. False: Measurements are treated individually. Some might fail while others are persisted in the database. in v1.21, the API only support True. The value must be true in v1.21

measurements.description: A list of measurements on the measurement point

operatorStationId.description: A unique operator station id within the operator organization

stationOwnerCvr.description: Station owner CVR with the format of DK12345678

operatorCvr.description: Operator CVR with the format of DK12345678

measurementPointTypeSc.description: The stancode of measurement point type (subset of stancode list 1002) that is created with the station automatically. If it is not presented, measurement point type is decided by the system

fromDateTime.description: From a date time in UTC format (RFC3339 specification)

toDateTime.description: To a date time in UTC format (RFC3339 specification)

measurementDateTime.description: Measurement date time in UTC format (RFC3339 specification)

changedTimestamp.description: Changed timestamp in UTC format (RFC3339 specification)

measurementDateTimes.description: A list of measurement dates in UTC format (RFC3339 specification)

measurementDateTime.description: Measurement time in UTC format (RFC3339 specification) without second component

reasonCodeSc.description: Reason code stancode, a subset of stancode list 1188

measurementDateTime.description: Measurement time in UTC format (RFC3339 specification) without second component

reasonCodeSc.description: Reason code stancode, a subset of stancode list 1188

Dmp.Hydro.Api.Requests.StationIdentifier.description: A station can be identified using either Id or OperatorStationId

examinationTypeSc.description: Examination type stancode, a subset of stancode list 1101

measurementPointTypeSc.description: Measurement point type stancode, a subset of stancode 1002, used for the examination type

reasonCodesSc.description: List of reason codes stancode, a subset of stancode 1188, used for the examination type.

parameterSc.description: Parameter stancode, a subset of stancode list 1008

unitSc.description: Unit stancode, a subset of stancode list 1009

min.description: Min value of measurements under the examination type

max.description: Max value of measurements under the examination type

decimals.description: Number of decimals rounded for the measurements values

measurementPointTypeSc.description: Measurement point type stancode, a subset of stancode list 1002

measurementPointNumber.description: Measurement point number in the station

examinationTypeSc.description: Examination type stancode, a subset of stancode 1101

transactionBased.description: True: The batch is treated as a transaction. If one or more fails, no data is persisted in the database. False: Measurements are treated individually. Some might fail while others are persisted in the database. in v1.21, the API only support True. The value must be true in v1.21

stationOwnerCvr.description: Station owner cvr. Update the new station owner if it is provided

operatorCvr.description: Operator cvr. Update the new operator if it is provided

operatorStationId.description: A unique operator station id within the operator organization

created.description: The time data is stored in the database for the batch

successful.description: A list of measurements that were stored

failed.description: A list of measurements that were failed to store

isSuccess.description: If transaction-based, this will be 'true' for the measurement which succeeds and 'false' for the ones which fails

created.description: Date and time when the logger association was created. Blank if no logger associated

effective.description: Date and time from when measurements are being read from the associated logger. Blank if no logger associated

measurementDateTime.description: Measurement date time in UTC format (RFC3339 specification)

result.description: Measurement result at the time (CreateTimestamp property)

resultElevationCorrected.description: Elevation corrected result. Only available for Water Level examination

loggerId.description: Id of the logger that provided the measurement result

createdTimestamp.description: The timestamp in UTC format (RFC3339 specification) when the result was delivered

measurementDateTime.description: Measurement date time in UTC format (RFC3339 specification)

result.description: Measurement result at the time (CreateTimestamp property)

measurementPoints.description: A list of measurement points data in station

number.description: Measurement point number in a station

examinations.description: A list of examination performed on the measurement point

firstResult.description: A time when the first result was measured

latestResult.description: A time when the last result was measured

action.description: Action is either 'committed' or 'ignored'. 'committed' if written to database, 'ignored' is result already existed at the given measurementDatetime (Independent of result value)

created.description: The time data is stored in the database for the batch

successful.description: A list of measurements that were stored

failed.description: A list of measurements that were failed to store

measurementDateTime.description: Measurement date time in UTC format (RFC3339 specification)

result.description: Measurement result at the time (CreateTimestamp property)

resultElevationCorrected.description: Elevation corrected result. Only available for Water Level examination
